title: Thunderbird email archiving
content: Thunderbird randomly archives a significant percentage of my emails. I would like to stop that and control which email is archived. Is there a way to accomplish this? Thanks.
creator: strathconabee

title: After clicking on the message pop-up on the Thunderbird email client, the email appears blank,Open other windows to overwrite, then close other windows to resolve the issue. How can I view emails normally after clicking on the message pop-up
